name: Full stack / Backend Web Developer - CIS Technology Services - Internal Client Services
description: Every story has a beginning. Deloitte is one of the leading international professional services firms that offers audit, consulting, corporate finance, enterprise risk, and tax and legal services. Deloitte is represented in six of Russia's largest cities, including Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Ufa, Ekaterinburg, Novosibirsk and Yuzhno-Sakhalinsk, where over 2,100 of our specialists are employed. Our vision and strategy, developed in collaboration with leadership and member firm partners from around the world, focuses on working together As One across geographic, functional, and business borders to deliver excellence in all of the services provided by the member firms. The role will include  Development and enhancement of internal business applications, using .Net platform and MS Visual Studio/VS Code as development environment. Development and enhancement of business applications for SharePoint 2016 platform using SharePoint Online principles: PNP, SharePoint framework (ReactJS). Building workflows using Visual Studio and Nintex Workflow engine. Database design and development based on MS SQL Server platform using Entity framework. Possible usage of NoSQL databases for selected projects. 3rd level support for internally developed applications Evaluation of new technologies, standards, software product versions, and development tools in the area. Working with business process experts and technical support staff. Contribution to design, implementation and testing phases of related projects.  The successful candidate should have  High level of knowledge in .Net area: C#, ASP.NET, MVC, WebAPI Hands on experience in Web related technologies: HTML 5, JavaScript (EC5,6, NodeJS), CSS3. Experience with Web UI frameworks (Angular, Angular 2+, React) is a plus. Hands on experience in database development, preferably MS SQL Server PowerShell programming skills. Good understanding of Git workflow. Experience with Team Foundation Server is a plus. Experience with SharePoint 2010, 2013 development is a big plus. Good knowledge of API models, internal web application structure, SharePoint solutions structure. Experience with IOC/DI frameworks (Autofac, Ninject). Experience with test frameworks: .Net: NUnit, JavaScript: Jest, Mocha, mocking frameworks: Moq, Fakeiteasy Understanding of Agile principles. Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.  Personal Qualifications  Bachelor’s degree or equivalent education Ability to effectively translate business needs into technical solutions Ability to complete tasks independently Good command of written/verbal Russian and English Ability to work in a team, as well as individually
